sect2.title: Installation of Binutils

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../binutils-&binutils-version;-lib-path.patch mkdir ../binutils-build cd ../binutils-build ../binutils-&binutils-version;/configure --prefix=/stage1 \ --enable-shared --with-lib-path=/stage1/lib make tooldir=/stage1 make tooldir=/stage1 check make tooldir=/stage1 install
make -C ld clean make -C ld tooldir=/stage1 LIB_PATH=/usr/lib:/lib

sect2.para: Do not remove the binutils-* directories after the installation. We'll need this directory again in chapter 6 as-is.
